verses.text: O clap \add your\add* hands, all ye people; Shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
For the \sc Lord\sc* most High \add is\add* terrible; \add He is\add* a great King over all the earth.
He shall subdue the people under us, And the nations under our feet.
He shall choose our inheritance for us, The excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.
God is gone up with a shout, The \sc Lord\sc* with the sound of a trumpet.
Sing \add praises\add* to God, sing \add praises:\add* Sing \add praises\add* unto our King, sing \add praises\add*.
For God \add is\add* the King of all the earth: Sing ye \add praises\add* with understanding.
God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.
The princes of the people are gathered together, \add Even\add* the people of the God of Abraham: For the shields of the earth \add belong\add* unto God: He is greatly exalted.
